Your mission: To support the Creative Services department by designing engaging, responsive digital assets that enhance our website and digital platforms. You'll collaborate Website Operations and Marketing to ensure a consistent user experience that aligns with our branding and marketing initiatives. What we offer: • Free parking at both of our Victoria locations, • Green Transportation Incentive - bus, bike or walk to work and earn extra money for it! • Social Committee Events - games nights, cabin trips, bowling, camping and more, • …and most importantly, a genuinely great culture fostered by the senior management team and sustained by fantastic people! What we hope to create: Solutions for building operators to enable the vision of Net-Zero Emissions by 2050. Help us get there. In this role you will: • Assist in creating digital graphics, icons, banners, and other imagery to support website content, UI/UX, and digital campaigns. • Help ensure design work adheres to brand guidelines and visual standards. • Support developers and UI/UX leads by providing design assets and learning how they are integrated into websites and applications. • Assist in preparing and exporting assets optimized for performance across devices (desktop, mobile, tablet). • Participate in brainstorming sessions to contribute fresh design ideas for web and digital campaigns. • Assist with implementing design assets into websites and maintaining visual consistency. • Stay current with web and design trends, tools, and technologies to continually improve skills. • Support day-to-day departmental tasks as needed. You'll have access to: • An onboarding package to get you up to speed • Online training courses A mentor • Let's connect! At Reliable Controls it's not only experience and skills we are seeking; alignment with our values is of the utmost importance to us. Continuous improvement is vital to our organization, and we are prepared to invest in our team's future, not just their current abilities. Let's connect. We would love to hear from you!
